channel.title: Social Responsibility on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Social Responsibility on FinanClub

item.title: 1055 WFC
item.description: score:1055 Chances: Wells Fargo is supporting a national expansion of Concordance, indicating the company’s commitment to social responsibility. The commercial real estate industry coming into focus following the Federal Reserve’s interest rate hikes could create potential opportunities for Wells Fargo. The talk about bringing manufacturing back to the US could lead to increased business activities for financial institutions like Wells Fargo.
